description:
Demolition of existing buildings and erection of part 6,9 and 11 storey plus basement building to provide B1 office floorspace with 10 car parking spaces and servicing facilities 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  Dwg Nos.: GA/0120/120. GA/0120/121,                         GA/0120/122, GA/0120/151, GA/0120/                         152, GA/0120/153
decision_conditions:
The London Borough of Islington objections to the proposals for the following reasons: 

 1. The excessive scale of the development would have an adverse impact on the Moorfields Conservation Area and on the setting of a number of locally listed buildings. 2. The existing building (4 storeys) contributes positively to the existing character of the area. 3. The proposed design appears to be extremely unsympathetic to its surroundings.
